sentences.en: Nonetheless, it can a very bang or crack, like a loud horsewhip.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 可能会有巨响和爆裂, 就像是一声响亮的马鞭.

sentences.en: The Expensive Horsewhip One day, a horsewhip-seller came to a market. His horsewhip didnt seem good.
sentences.cn: 昂贵的马鞭 有一天，市场上来了个卖马鞭的人。

sentences.en: The horsewhip-seller appeared to be very angry.
sentences.cn: 卖 马鞭的人显出很生气的样子。

sentences.en: The horsewhip-seller suddenly laughed and paid no attention to him.
sentences.cn: 卖马鞭的人忽然 笑了起来，理也不理他。

sentences.en: These criminals deserve to be horse-whipped.
sentences.cn: 这些罪犯应该用马鞭抽一顿。

trans.tran_en: A horsewhip is a long, thin piece of leather on the end of a short, stiff handle. It is used to train and control horses.
If someone horsewhips an animal or a person, they hit them several times with a horsewhip in order to hurt or punish them
